column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Food: We ordered quite a few appetizer items. They were all good. My favorite was the Spicy Creamy Shrimp tempura. For the ramen
column2: I loved my Spicy Tonkatsu soup. The Pork Chashu that came with the Ramen was awesome
column3: and the broth was unbelievable. Each of us also paired the the ramen with  either rice bowl or gyoza.  The Chicken Chashu rice bowl was  also good.
